title: France - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid Passport at least with 07 months Validity.
Last Six Months Bank Statement with Solvency Certificate.
Salary Slips of last 3 months with Organization seal.
Savings Documents (FDR, Property Documents or any assets documents).
Current Home addresses (both applicant & spouse- from when you are living there).
Parents (Father, Mother) Names and address and Date of birth (both applicant).
Name, address, passport number of any family member or friend lives in the France.

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
